title: World War II is Coming
description:
# World War II is Coming (2023)

- Warned that Biden could **"plunge the world into World War II"** [Source: Washington DC summit, 2023; The Mirror]
- World War II ended in **1945** - nearly 80 years ago
- Unclear if he meant World War III or was confused about history
summary:

- World War II ended in 1945 - nearly 80 years ago
- Unclear if he meant World War III or was confused about history
